name: Customer Directory
backend_requirements: 1. Customer model: id, name (required), email (required, unique), phone, company, notes
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/customers, POST, PUT, DELETE
3. Search customers: ?query=text searches name, email, company
frontend_requirements: 1. Customer list table: name, email, phone, company

api_endpoints.description: List all customers (supports ?query=text to search name, email, company)
